trans-unit.target: 第一次运行此命令时,Chef Infra Client会被下载。该命令的输出类似于

trans-unit.source: Chef Infra Client is installed on each node that is managed with Chef Infra. Chef Infra Client configures the node locally by performing the tasks specified in the run-list. Chef Infra Client will also pull down any required configuration data from the Chef Infra Server during a Chef Infra Client run.
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra Client 安装在每个使用 Chef Infra 管理的节点上。Chef Infra Client通过执行运行列表中指定的任务在本地配置节点。在Chef Infra Client运行期间,Chef Infra Client还将从Chef Infra服务器中提取任何所需的配置数据。

trans-unit.source: Chef Infra Client is installed on the target node using a system native package (.rpm, .msi, etc).
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra Client使用系统原生包(.rpm、.msi等)安装在目标节点上。

trans-unit.source: Chef Infra Client processes recipes in two phases:
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra Client分两个阶段处理配方。

trans-unit.source: Chef Infra Client provisioner only.
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra Client provisioner only.

trans-unit.source: Chef Infra Client provisioner only. A list of client.rb file settings. For example:
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra Client provisioner only.client.rb文件的设置列表。例如:

trans-unit.source: Chef Infra Client provisioner only. The port on which chef-zero is to listen.
trans-unit.target: 仅限 Chef Infra 客户端供应者。chef-zero要监听的端口。

trans-unit.source: Chef Infra Client pulls down the node object from the Chef Infra Server and then rebuilds it. A node object is made up of the system attributes discovered by Ohai, the attributes set in Policyfiles or Cookbooks, and the run list of cookbooks. The first time Chef Infra Client runs on a node, it creates a node object from the the default run-list. A node that has not yet had a Chef Infra Client run will not have a node object or a Chef Infra Server entry for a node object. On any subsequent Chef Infra Client runs, the rebuilt node object will also contain the run-list from the previous Chef Infra Client run.
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra Client从Chef Infra Server中拉下节点对象,然后重建节点对象。节点对象由Ohai发现的系统属性、Policyfiles或Cookbook中设置的属性以及Cookbook的运行列表组成。Chef Infra Client 第一次在节点上运行时,会从默认的运行列表中创建一个节点对象。尚未运行过Chef Infra Client的节点将没有节点对象或Chef Infra Server的节点对象条目。在任何后续的Chef Infra Client运行中,重建的节点对象也将包含之前Chef Infra Client运行的运行列表。

trans-unit.source: Chef Infra Client pushes the node object to the Chef Infra Server at the end of a Chef Infra Client run; the updated node object on the Chef Infra Server is then indexed for search and is stored until the next Chef Infra Client run
trans-unit.target: 在Chef Infra Client运行结束时,Chef Infra Client会将节点对象推送到Chef Infra服务器;然后,Chef Infra服务器上的更新节点对象会被索引以进行搜索,并存储到下一次Chef Infra Client运行。

trans-unit.source: Chef Infra Client ran the first resource before the breakpoint (file[/tmp/before-breakpoint]), but then stopped after execution. Chef Infra Client attempted to name the breakpoint after its position in the source file, but Chef Infra Client was confused because the resource was entered interactively. From here, chef-shell can resume the interrupted Chef Infra Client run:
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra Client在断点（ file[/tmp/before-breakpoint] ）之前运行了第一个资源，但是在执行后又停止了。 Chef Infra Client尝试以断点在源文件中的位置命名，但是由于资源是交互式输入的，Chef Infra Client感到困惑。在这里，chef-shell可以恢复中断的Chef Infra Client运行：

trans-unit.source: Chef Infra Client requests all off the cookbook files (including recipes, templates, resources, providers, attributes, and libraries) that it needs for every action identified in the run-list from the Chef Infra Server. The Chef Infra Server responds to Chef Infra Client with the complete list of files. Chef Infra Client compares the list of files to the files that already exist on the node from previous runs, and then downloads a copy of every new or modified file from the Chef Infra Server.
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra Client从Chef Infra Server请求运行列表中标识的每个操作所需的所有食谱文件（包括配方，模板，资源，提供程序，属性和库）。Chef Infra Server用完整的文件列表响应Chef Infra Client。Chef Infra Client将文件列表与先前运行中节点上已经存在的文件进行比较，然后从Chef Infra Server下载每个新文件或修改后文件的副本。

trans-unit.source: Chef Infra Client run API /api/x_chef_incident/client_run
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra客户端运行API /api/x_chef_incident/client_run。

trans-unit.source: Chef Infra Client run reporting, compliance reporting, high availability configurations, and Chef Infra Server replication are available as part of Chef Automate.
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra客户端运行报告、合规性报告、高可用性配置和Chef Infra服务器复制都可以作为Chef Automate的一部分。

trans-unit.source: Chef Infra Client runs are daemonized, and are not initiated by a cron job. Using cron to schedule runs can create “thundering herd” problems
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra Client运行是守护进程，而不是由cron作业启动的。使用cron安排运行时间可能会造成“雷声大浪”问题

trans-unit.source: Chef Infra Client runs are set to a default 30-minute interval with a 5-minute splay
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra客户端运行设置为默认的30分钟间隔,有5分钟的间隔。

trans-unit.source: Chef Infra Client runs menu item
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra客户端运行菜单项目

trans-unit.source: Chef Infra Client supports reading multiple configuration files by putting them inside a .d configuration directory. For example: /etc/chef/client.d. All files that end in .rb in the .d directory are loaded; other non-.rb files are ignored.
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra Client支持通过将多个配置文件放在 .d 配置目录中来读取它们。例如： /etc/chef/client.d 。所有文件，在年底 .rb 在 .d 目录加载; 其他非 .rb 文件将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: Chef Infra Client uses shared secret encryption; an encrypted file can only be decrypted by a node or a user with the same shared secret
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra Client使用共享秘密加密；加密的文件只能由具有相同共享机密的节点或用户解密

trans-unit.source: Chef Infra Client uses Ruby as its reference language for creating cookbooks and defining recipes, with an extended DSL for specific resources. Chef Infra Client provides a reasonable set of resources, enough to support many of the most common infrastructure automation scenarios; however, this DSL can also be extended when additional resources and capabilities are required.
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra Client使用Ruby作为创建食谱和定义食谱的参考语言,并为特定资源提供了扩展DSL。Chef Infra Client提供了一套合理的资源,足以支持许多最常见的基础设施自动化场景;但是,当需要额外的资源和功能时,这个DSL也可以进行扩展。

trans-unit.source: Chef Infra Client uses six types of attributes to determine the value that is applied to a node during a Chef Infra Client run. In addition, Chef Infra Client gathers attribute values from up to five locations. The combination of attribute types and sources makes up to 15 different competing values available during a Chef Infra Client run:
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra Client使用六种类型的属性来确定在Chef Infra Client运行期间应用到节点的值。此外,Chef Infra Client从最多五个位置收集属性值。属性类型和来源的组合使得在Chef Infra Client运行期间有多达15种不同的竞争值可用。

trans-unit.source: Chef Infra Client will manage the permissions of the entire directory structure below /html, for a total of 12 files and 4 directories. For example:
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra Client将管理 /html 下的整个目录结构的权限，总共12个文件和4个目录。例如：

trans-unit.source: Chef Infra Client will only update the property values that require updates and will not make changes when the property values are already in the desired state
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra Client将只更新需要更新的属性值,当属性值已经处于所需状态时,将不会进行更改

trans-unit.source: Chef Infra Client will pick up the _default run-list if env_run_list[environment_name] is null or nonexistent.
trans-unit.target: 如果 env_run_list[environment_name] 为空或不存在，Chef Infra Client将获取 _default 运行列表。

trans-unit.source: Chef Infra Client will pull down the node object from the Chef Infra Server and then reset all the attributes except normal. The node object will contain the attribute data from the previous Chef Infra Client run including attributes set with JSON files via -j.
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra Client将从Chef Infra Server下拉节点对象，然后重置除 normal 之外的所有属性。节点对象将包含来自先前Chef Infra Client运行的属性数据，包括通过 -j 用JSON文件设置的属性。

trans-unit.source: Chef Infra Client will rebuild the attribute list and apply attribute precedence while configuring the node
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra Client将重建属性列表,并在配置节点时应用属性优先级。

trans-unit.source: Chef Infra Client will run a recipe only when asked. When Chef Infra Client runs the same recipe more than once, the results will be the same system state each time. When a recipe is run against a system, but nothing has changed on either the system or in the recipe, Chef Infra Client won’t change anything.
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra Client仅在询问时运行配方。当Chef Infra Client多次运行相同的配方时，每次的结果将是相同的系统状态。当针对系统运行配方时，但系统或配方中的任何内容均未更改时，Chef Infra Client将不会进行任何更改。

trans-unit.source: Chef Infra Client will update the cookbooks on the node (if required), which updates the attributes contained in attribute files and recipes
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra Client将更新节点上的食谱(如果需要),从而更新属性文件和食谱中包含的属性。

trans-unit.source: Chef Infra Client will update the role and environment data (if required)
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra客户端将更新角色和环境数据(如果需要)。

trans-unit.source: Chef Infra Client, by default, will attempt to execute a Homebrew command as the owner of /usr/local/bin/brew. If that executable does not exist, Chef Infra Client will attempt to find the user by executing which brew. If that executable cannot be found, Chef Infra Client will print an error message: Could not find the "brew" executable in /usr/local/bin or anywhere on the path.. Use the homebrew_user attribute to specify the Homebrew owner for situations where Chef Infra Client cannot automatically detect the correct owner.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，Chef Infra Client将尝试以 /usr/local/bin/brew 的所有者身份执行Homebrew命令。如果该可执行文件不存在，Chef Infra Client将尝试通过执行 which brew 来查找用户。如果找不到该可执行文件，Chef Infra Client将显示错误消息： Could not find the "brew" executable in /usr/local/bin or anywhere on the path. 。如果Chef Infra Client无法自动检测到正确的所有者，请使用 homebrew_user 属性指定Homebrew所有者。

trans-unit.source: Chef Infra Client: /opt/chef/embedded/ssl/certs/cacert.pem

trans-unit.source: Chef Infra Server 13 and 14 supports Chef Manage and Push Jobs. Both of these add-ons are deprecated. After upgrading Chef Infra Server, reinstall the add-on and then reconfigure Chef Infra Server and the add-on.

trans-unit.source: Chef Infra Server 14
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra Server 14

trans-unit.source: Chef Infra Server 14 uses Elasticsearch as its search index. The Chef Infra Server 14 upgrade process requires downtime for stopping the server, installing the new package, and then upgrading the server, which will include an automatic Elasticsearch reindexing operation for existing Solr users. We estimate the reindexing operation will take 2 minutes for each 1000 nodes, but the it could take more time, depending on your server hardware and the complexity of your Chef data.
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra Server 14使用Elasticsearch作为其搜索索引。Chef Infra Server 14升级过程需要停机,用于停止服务器,安装新的软件包,然后升级服务器,这将包括对现有Solr用户进行Elasticsearch自动重新索引操作。我们估计每1000个节点的重新索引操作需要2分钟,但可能需要更多的时间,这取决于您的服务器硬件和Chef数据的复杂性。

trans-unit.source: Chef Infra defines a common workflow for cookbook development:
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra定义了烹饪书开发的通用工作流程。

trans-unit.source: Chef Infra has the following major components:
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra有以下主要组成部分:

trans-unit.source: Chef Infra is a powerful automation platform that transforms infrastructure into code. Chef Infra automates how infrastructure is configured, deployed, and managed across your network, no matter its size.
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra 是一个强大的自动化平台,可将基础架构转化为代码。Chef Infra可以自动配置、部署和管理网络中的基础设施,无论其规模大小。

trans-unit.source: Chef Infra is a powerful automation platform that transforms infrastructure into code. Whether you’re operating in the cloud, on-premises, or in a hybrid environment, Chef Infra automates how infrastructure is configured, deployed, and managed across your network, no matter its size.
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra是一个功能强大的自动化平台，可将基础架构转换为代码。无论您是在云中，本地还是混合环境中进行操作，Chef Infra均可自动在整个网络中自动配置，部署和管理基础架构，无论其规模如何。

trans-unit.source: Chef Infra is a systems and cloud infrastructure automation framework that makes it easy to deploy servers and applications to any physical, virtual, or cloud location, no matter the size of the infrastructure. Each organization is comprised of one (or more) Chef Workstation installations, a single server, and every node that will be configured and maintained by Chef Infra Client. Cookbooks (and recipes) are used to tell Chef Infra Client how each node in your organization should be configured. Chef Infra Client—which is installed on every node—does the actual configuration.
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra是一个系统和云基础架构自动化框架，无论基础架构的大小如何，均可轻松将服务器和应用程序部署到任何物理，虚拟或云位置。每个组织由一个（或多个）Chef Workstation安装，单个服务器以及将由Chef Infra Client配置和维护的每个节点组成。食谱（和食谱）用于告诉Chef Infra Client如何配置组织中的每个节点。安装在每个节点上的Chef Infra Client执行实际配置。

trans-unit.source: Chef Infra is constructed so that most of the computational effort occurs on the nodes rather than on the Chef Infra Server. A node represents any system you manage and is typically a virtual machine, container instance, or physical server. Basically, it’s any compute resource in your infrastructure that’s managed by Chef Infra. All nodes have Chef Infra Client installed on them, and Chef Infra Client is available for multiple platforms including Linux, macOS, Windows, AIX, and Solaris.
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra的构造使大部分计算工作都在节点上进行，而不是在Chef Infra Server上进行。节点代表您管理的任何系统，通常是虚拟机，容器实例或物理服务器。基本上，它是基础架构中由Chef Infra管理的任何计算资源。所有节点上均安装了Chef Infra Client，Chef Infra Client可用于多个平台，包括Linux，macOS，Windows，AIX和Solaris。

trans-unit.source: Chef Infra provides a growing number of Windows-specific resources.
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra提供了越来越多的Windows专用资源。

trans-unit.target: Chef Infra。使用chef命令行工具处理chef-repo中的项目,chef-repo是编写、测试和维护食谱的主要地点,并将政策上传到Chef Infra服务器。

trans-unit.source: Chef Manage can support logging in users via SAML authentication. In order to do so, there must be a Chef Automate Server that is configured to act as a SAML Identity Provider (IdP). When the Chef Automate Server is configured to do so, it will provide an OpenID Connect (OIDC) protocol end-point that Chef Manage can use to initiate authentication.
trans-unit.target: Chef Manage 可以支持通过 SAML 身份验证登录用户。为了做到这一点,必须有一个配置为作为SAML身份提供者(IdP)的Chef Automate服务器。当Chef Automate服务器被配置为这样做时,它将提供一个OpenID Connect (OIDC)协议端点,Chef Manage可以用来启动身份验证。

trans-unit.source: Chef Manage is deprecated and no longer under active development. It is supported on Chef Automate installations up to version 1.8 and replaced by Chef Automate 2.0. Contact your Chef account representative for information about upgrading your system. See our Automate documentation to learn more about Chef Automate 2.
trans-unit.target: 不推荐使用Chef Manage，并且不再进行积极开发。在最高版本为1.8的Chef Automate安装中受支持，并由Chef Automate 2.0取代。请与您的Chef客户代表联系，以获取有关升级系统的信息。请参阅我们的自动化文档，以了解有关Chef Automate 2的更多信息。

trans-unit.source: Chef Manage is deprecated and will reach EOL on December 31, 2021. Chef Manage is a management console for data bags, attributes, run-lists, roles, environments, and cookbooks from a web user interface
trans-unit.target: Chef Manage已弃用，并将于2021年12月31日终止服务。Chef Manage是一个管理控制台，可通过Web用户界面管理数据包，属性，运行列表，角色，环境和食谱

trans-unit.source: Chef Manage is the web interface for the Chef Infra Server, which uses the Chef Infra Server API for all communication to the Chef Infra Server.
trans-unit.target: Chef Manage是Chef Infra服务器的Web界面,它使用Chef Infra服务器API与Chef Infra服务器进行所有通信。

trans-unit.source: Chef Manage uses the Web UI private key for signing requests sent to the Chef Infra Server. The key is subject to Chef server’s Secrets Management, and will be stored in /etc/opscode/private-chef-secrets.json.
trans-unit.target: Chef Manage使用Web UI私钥对发送到Chef Infra Server的请求进行签名。该密钥受Chef服务器的Secrets Management约束，并将存储在 /etc/opscode/private-chef-secrets.json 中。

trans-unit.source: Chef Push Jobs has the following requirements:
trans-unit.target: 厨推工作有以下要求。

trans-unit.source: Chef Push Jobs has three main components: jobs (managed by the Chef Push Jobs server), a client that is installed on every node in the organization, and one (or more) workstations from which job messages are initiated.
trans-unit.target: Chef Push Jobs有三个主要组件:作业(由Chef Push Jobs服务器管理),安装在组织中每个节点上的客户端,以及一个(或多个)工作站,作业消息从这些工作站发起。

trans-unit.source: Chef Push Jobs is an extension of the Chef Infra Server that allows jobs to be run against nodes independently of a Chef Infra Client run. A job is an action or a command to be executed against a subset of nodes; the nodes against which a job is run are determined by the results of a search query made to the Chef Infra Server.
trans-unit.target: Chef Push Jobs是Chef Infra Server的扩展,它允许独立于Chef Infra客户端运行的节点运行作业。作业是针对节点子集执行的动作或命令;作业所针对的节点由向Chef Infra服务器进行搜索查询的结果决定。

trans-unit.source: Chef Push Jobs is installed to the following locations:
trans-unit.target: 厨师推送工作被安装到以下位置。

trans-unit.source: Chef Push Jobs uses the Chef Infra Server API and a Ruby client to initiate all connections to the Chef Infra Server. Connections use the same authentication and authorization model as any other request made to the Chef Infra Server. A knife plugin is used to initiate job creation and job tracking.
trans-unit.target: Chef Push Jobs使用Chef Infra Server API和Ruby客户端来启动所有与Chef Infra服务器的连接。连接使用与任何其他向Chef Infra服务器提出的请求相同的认证和授权模型。一个小刀插件用于启动作业创建和作业跟踪。

trans-unit.source: Chef Server 12 and later enables SSL verification by default for all requests made to the server, such as those made by knife and Chef Infra Client. The certificate that is generated during the installation of the Chef Infra Server is self-signed, which means the certificate is not signed by a trusted certificate authority (CA) that ships with Chef Infra Client. The certificate generated by the Chef Infra Server must be downloaded to any machine from which knife and/or Chef Infra Client will make requests to the Chef Infra Server.
trans-unit.target: Chef Server 12及以后的版本默认为所有向服务器发出的请求启用SSL验证,例如刀和Chef Infra Client发出的请求。在安装Chef Infra Server期间生成的证书是自签名的,这意味着该证书不是由Chef Infra Client附带的受信任证书机构(CA)签署的。由Chef Infra服务器生成的证书必须下载到任何一台机器上,在这台机器上,小刀和/或Chef Infra Client将向Chef Infra服务器发出请求。

trans-unit.source: Chef Server 12 and later enables SSL verification by default for all requests made to the server, such as those made by knife and Chef Infra Client. The certificate that is generated during the installation of the Chef Infra Server is self-signed, which means there isn’t a signing certificate authority (CA) to verify. In addition, this certificate must be downloaded to any machine from which knife and/or Chef Infra Client will make requests to the Chef Infra Server.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，Chef Server 12和更高版本启用对服务器发出的所有请求（例如，刀子和Chef Infra Client发出的请求）的SSL验证。在安装Chef Infra Server期间生成的证书是自签名的，这意味着没有要验证的签名证书颁发机构（CA）。此外，必须将此证书下载到刀和/或Chef Infra Client从其向Chef Infra Server发出请求的任何计算机上。

trans-unit.source: Chef Software aims to make upgrading from a non-EULA version to a EULA version as simple as possible. For some products (Chef Client 14.12.9, Chef InSpec 3.9.3), we added backwards-compatible support for the --chef-license command that performs a no-op. This allows customers to start specifying that argument in whatever way they manage those products before upgrading.
trans-unit.target: Chef Software的目标是使从非EULA版本升级到EULA版本的过程尽可能简单。对于某些产品（Chef Client 14.12.9，Chef InSpec 3.9.3），我们为执行no-op的 --chef-license 命令添加了向后兼容的支持。这样，客户就可以在升级之前以管理产品的任何方式开始指定该参数。

trans-unit.source: Chef Software products are also distributed as Habitat packages, such as Chef Infra Client, Chef InSpec, etc. When Chef products are installed as Habitat, the products request license acceptance at product usage time. Whether installed as system packages or as Habitat packages, users accept the licenses in the same way detailed above.
trans-unit.target: Chef软件产品也以Habitat包的形式发布,如Chef Infra Client、Chef InSpec等。当Chef产品作为Habitat安装时,产品在产品使用时要求接受许可证。不管是作为系统包安装还是作为Habitat包安装,用户接受许可证的方式都和上面详细介绍的一样。

trans-unit.source: Chef Software requires all contributors to include a Developer Certificate of Origin (DCO) sign-off with their pull request as long as the pull request does not fall under the Obvious Fix rule. This attests that you have the right to submit the work that you are contributing in your pull request.
trans-unit.target: Chef软件要求所有贡献者在其拉取请求中都包括开发人员原产地证书（DCO）签名，只要该拉取请求不属于“明显修复”规则之内。这证明您有权提交您在请求请求中贡献的工作。

trans-unit.source: Chef Software’s Desktop pattern and tools expands familiar device management systems with extensive application and configuration capabilities that are designed to scale with automation.
trans-unit.target: Chef Software的桌面模式和工具通过旨在自动扩展的广泛应用程序和配置功能，扩展了熟悉的设备管理系统。

trans-unit.source: Chef Software’s Upgrade Lab provides an isolated cookbook development environment and in-line support to help you upgrade your system, so you can stop using legacy Chef Infra and start using modern Chef Infra.
trans-unit.target: Chef软件的升级实验室提供了隔离的食谱开发环境和在线支持，以帮助您升级系统，因此您可以停止使用旧版Chef Infra，而开始使用现代Chef Infra。

trans-unit.source: Chef Supermarket installations can also use an external cache store. The public Chef Supermarket uses Redis on Amazon ElastiCache. One Redis instance per private Chef Supermarket application server may be run safely. Use Redis 2.8 (or higher) for a high availability pair. To use an external cache, configure the following attributes in the /recipes/default.rb recipe of the wrapper cookbook:
trans-unit.target: Chef Supermarket安装程序还可以使用外部缓存存储。公共厨师超级市场在Amazon ElastiCache上使用Redis。每个私有Chef Supermarket应用程序服务器一个Redis实例可以安全运行。将Redis 2.8（或更高版本）用于高可用性对。要使用外部缓存，请在包装指南的 /recipes/default.rb 配方中配置以下属性：

trans-unit.source: Chef Supermarket is a Ruby on Rails application with a PostgreSQL backend. The private Chef Supermarket configuration may be scaled-out, such as using an external database, using an external cache, and using an external cookbook storage location.
trans-unit.target: Chef Supermarket是一个带有PostgreSQL后台的Ruby on Rails应用程序。私人Chef Supermarket的配置可能会被扩展,例如使用外部数据库,使用外部缓存,以及使用外部cookbook存储位置。

trans-unit.source: Chef Supermarket is the location in which community cookbooks are authored and maintained. Cookbooks that are part of the Chef Supermarket may be used by any Chef user. How community cookbooks are used varies from organization to organization.
trans-unit.target: 厨师超市是编写和维护社区烹饪书的地方。任何 Chef 使用者都可以使用 Chef 超市中的烹飪書。社区食谱的使用方式因组织而异。

trans-unit.source: Chef Vault 1.0 style decryption is supported, however it has been deprecated and Chef Vault 2.0 decryption should be used instead
trans-unit.target: 支持Chef Vault 1.0风格的解密,但是它已经被废弃,应该使用Chef Vault 2.0解密。

trans-unit.source: Chef Vault does not currently support alternate keying mechanisms like GPG and Amazon KMS.
trans-unit.target: Chef Vault目前不支持GPG和Amazon KMS等备用密钥机制。

trans-unit.source: Chef Vault provides a helper method to determine if a data bag item is a vault, which can be helpful if you produce a recipe for community consumption and want to support both normal data bags and vaults:

trans-unit.source: Chef Vault provides a helper method to determine the type of a data bag item. It returns one of the symbols :normal, :encrypted or :vault
trans-unit.target: Chef Vault提供了一个辅助方法来确定数据袋项目的类型。它返回 :normal,:encrypted 或 :vault 中的一个符号。

trans-unit.source: Chef Workstation allows you to author cookbooks and administer your infrastructure. Chef Workstation runs on the computer you use everyday, whether it’s Linux, macOS, or Windows.
trans-unit.target: Chef Workstation允许您编写食谱并管理基础结构。Chef Workstation可以在您日常使用的计算机上运行，​​无论是Linux，macOS还是Windows。

trans-unit.source: Chef Workstation can be uninstalled using the steps below that are appropriate for the platform on which Chef Workstation is installed.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用以下适合安装Chef Workstation的平台的步骤卸载Chef Workstation。

trans-unit.source: Chef Workstation combines the power of InSpec and chef-run, giving you the ability to easily detect and correct issues on any target instance. One common task that administrators perform in their environments is installing the Network Time Protocol (NTP), which keeps the clocks in sync between servers. InSpec allows us to check if the package is installed with a query, using the InSpec package resource:
trans-unit.target: Chef Workstation结合了InSpec和 chef-run ，使您能够轻松检测和纠正任何目标实例上的问题。管理员在其环境中执行的一项常见任务是安装网络时间协议（NTP），该协议可使服务器之间的时钟保持同步。 InSpec允许我们使用InSpec package 资源来检查软件包是否与查询一起安装：

trans-unit.source: Chef Workstation contains everything that is needed to start using Chef Infra and Chef InSpec:
trans-unit.target: Chef Workstation包含开始使用Chef Infra和Chef InSpec所需的一切。

trans-unit.source: Chef Workstation contains multiple Chef Software products. When invoking the chef command line tool and accepting the license, users are required to accept the license for all the embedded products as well. The same license applies to all products, but each product must have its own license acceptance. chef <command> --chef-license accept will accept the license for Chef Workstation, Chef Infra Client, Chef InSpec, and Push Jobs Client. For example, chef env --chef-license accept.
trans-unit.target: Chef Workstation包含多个Chef软件产品。调用 chef 命令行工具并接受许可时，用户还必须接受所有嵌入式产品的许可。相同的许可证适用于所有产品，但每个产品必须具有自己的许可证接受。 chef <command> --chef-license accept 将接受Chef工作站，Chef Infra客户端，Chef InSpec和Push Jobs客户端的许可证。例如， chef env --chef-license accept 。

trans-unit.source: Chef Workstation gives you everything you need to get started with Chef. Start scanning and configuring your environments today with Chef InSpec and chef-run. Chef Workstation runs on the computer you use everyday, whether it’s Linux, macOS, or Windows. Chef Workstation ships with Chef Infra Client, Chef InSpec, Chef CLI, Test Kitchen, Cookstyle, and several other useful Chef tools. With this collection of programs and tools, you can make sure your Chef Infra code does what you intended before you deploy it to environments used by others.
trans-unit.target: Chef Workstation为您提供了开始使用Chef所需的一切。立即开始使用Chef InSpec和Chef-run扫描和配置您的环境。 Chef Workstation可以在您日常使用的计算机上运行，​​无论是Linux，macOS还是Windows。 Chef Workstation附带了Chef Infra Client，Chef InSpec，Chef CLI，Test Kitchen，Cookstyle和其他几个有用的Chef工具。使用此系列程序和工具，您可以确保在将Chef Infra代码部署到其他人使用的环境之前，可以完成预期的工作。

trans-unit.source: Chef Workstation gives you everything you need to get started with Chef. Start scanning and configuring your environments today with Chef InSpec and the chef-run tool. Chef Workstation runs on the computer you use everyday, whether it’s Linux, macOS, or Windows. Chef Workstation ships with Chef Infra Client, Chef InSpec, Chef CLI, Test Kitchen, Cookstyle, and other useful Chef tools. With this collection of programs and tools, you can make sure your Chef Infra code does what you intended before you deploy it to environments used by others.
trans-unit.target: Chef Workstation为您提供了开始使用Chef所需的一切。立即使用Chef InSpec和Chef chef-run 工具开始扫描和配置您的环境。 Chef Workstation可以在您日常使用的计算机上运行，​​无论是Linux，macOS还是Windows。 Chef Workstation附带了Chef Infra Client，Chef InSpec，Chef CLI，Test Kitchen，Cookstyle和其他有用的Chef工具。使用此系列程序和工具，您可以确保在将Chef Infra代码部署到其他人使用的环境之前，可以完成预期的工作。

trans-unit.source: Chef Workstation installs to /opt/chef-workstation/ on macOS / Linux and C:\opscode\chef-workstation\ on Windows. These file locations should help avoid interference between these components and other applications that may be running on the target machine.
trans-unit.target: Chef工作站安装在macOS / Linux上的 /opt/chef-workstation/ 和Windows上的 C:\opscode\chef-workstation\ 中。这些文件位置应有助于避免这些组件与目标计算机上可能正在运行的其他应用程序之间的干扰。

trans-unit.source: Chef Workstation is available in Azure Cloud Shell, allowing users to run ad-hoc configurations on target systems and any other Chef command when connected to an Azure subscription. This makes all of the Chef command line tools available, without installing software on a local machine.
trans-unit.target: Chef Workstation 在 Azure Cloud Shell 中可用,允许用户在连接到 Azure 订阅时,在目标系统上运行特设配置和任何其他 Chef 命令。这使得所有Chef命令行工具都可以使用,而无需在本地机器上安装软件。

trans-unit.source: Chef Workstation logs are stored in ~/.chef-workstation/logs.
trans-unit.target: Chef工作站日志存储在 ~/.chef-workstation/logs 。

trans-unit.target: Azure Cloud Shell 上的 Chef Workstation 让你可以使用。

trans-unit.source: Chef Workstation packages all the tools necessary to be successful with Chef Infra and InSpec. These tools are combined into native packages for common operating systems and include all the dependencies you need to get started.
trans-unit.target: Chef Workstation打包了所有成功使用Chef Infra和InSpec的必要工具。这些工具被组合成通用操作系统的本地包,并包含您开始使用所需的所有依赖性。

trans-unit.source: Chef Workstation replaces ChefDK, combining all the existing features with new features, such as ad-hoc task support and the new Chef Workstation desktop application. Chef will continue to maintain ChefDK, but new development will take place in Chef Workstation without back-porting features.
trans-unit.target: Chef Workstation取代了ChefDK,将所有现有的功能与新的功能结合在一起,如临时任务支持和新的Chef Workstation桌面应用程序。Chef将继续维护ChefDK,但新的开发将在Chef Workstation中进行,而不需要后端移植功能。

trans-unit.source: Chef Workstation ships with Cookstyle, ChefSpec, Chef InSpec, and Test Kitchen testing tools. With them, you can make sure your Chef Infra code does what you intended before you deploy it to environments used by others, such as staging or production.
trans-unit.target: Chef Workstation 隨附 Cookstyle、ChefSpec、Chef InSpec 和 Test Kitchen 測試工具。有了它们,您可以在将Chef Infra代码部署到他人使用的环境(如暂存或生产环境)之前,确保它符合您的意图。

trans-unit.source: Chef allows resources to be created with duplicate names, rather than treating that as an error. This means that several cookbooks can request the same package be installed, without needing to carefully create unique names. This is problematic because having multiple resources with the same name makes it impossible to safely deliver notifications to the right resource.
trans-unit.target: Chef允许用重复的名称创建资源,而不是将其视为错误。这意味着多个厨子可以请求安装相同的包,而不需要仔细创建独特的名称。这是有问题的,因为有多个具有相同名称的资源使得无法安全地将通知传递给正确的资源。

trans-unit.source: Chef also provides a single-resource solution to install the Network Time Protocol package:
trans-unit.target: Chef还提供了一个单一资源解决方案来安装网络时间协议包。

trans-unit.source: Chef does not merge any pull requests made against a Chef-managed open source repository until each commit has been signed for the DCO, with three exceptions:

trans-unit.source: Chef does not prescribe any specific editor. However, the Chef Infra extension for Visual Studio Code features several code generators and helpful features, such as running Cookstyle each time you save a recipe.
trans-unit.target: Chef没有规定任何特定的编辑器。然而，厨师红外扩展了Visual Studio代码具有几个代码生成器和有用的功能，如运行每次保存配方Cookstyle。

trans-unit.source: Chef does not prescribe any specific editor. However, we highly recommend using Visual Studio Code (VSCode) and the Chef Infra extension for VSCode, which features code generators and helpful features, such as running Cookstyle linting each time you save a recipe.
trans-unit.target: Chef没有规定任何特定的编辑器。但是，我们强烈建议将Visual Studio Code（VSCode）和Chef Infra扩展用于VSCode，它具有代码生成器和有用的功能，例如，每次保存配方时运行Cookstyle linting。

trans-unit.source: Chef is a powerful automation platform that transforms infrastructure into code. Whether you’re operating in the cloud, on-premises, or in a hybrid environment, Chef automates how infrastructure is configured, deployed, and managed across your network, no matter its size.
trans-unit.target: Chef是一个功能强大的自动化平台，可将基础架构转换为代码。无论您是在云中，本地还是混合环境中进行操作，Chef都会自动在整个网络中自动配置，部署和管理基础架构，无论其规模如何。

trans-unit.source: Chef is a thin DSL (domain-specific language) built on top of Ruby. This approach allows Chef to provide just enough abstraction to make reasoning about your infrastructure easy. Chef includes a built-in taxonomy of all the basic resources one might configure on a system, plus a defined mechanism to extend that taxonomy using the full power of the Ruby language. Ruby was chosen because it provides the flexibility to use both the simple built-in taxonomy, as well as being able to handle any customization path your organization requires.
trans-unit.target: Chef是一个建立在Ruby之上的瘦DSL(特定领域语言)。这种方法使Chef能够提供足够的抽象,使你的基础设施的推理变得简单。Chef包含了一个内置的分类法,它包含了一个系统上所有可能配置的基本资源,还有一个定义的机制来使用Ruby语言的全部功能来扩展这个分类法。之所以选择Ruby,是因为它既能灵活地使用简单的内置分类法,又能处理组织所需的任何定制路径。

trans-unit.source: Chef is an automation company. Ever since it was founded in 2008, we’ve been bringing together developers and system administrators with our namesake product, Chef Infra. Over the years, what we mean by automation has expanded. Today, Chef has a complete automation solution for both infrastructure and applications that takes you all the way from development to production. Here’s the complete Chef solution.
trans-unit.target: Chef是一家自动化公司。自2008年成立以来，我们一直将开发人员和系统管理员与同名产品Chef Infra召集在一起。多年来，我们所说的自动化已经扩展。如今，Chef为基础架构和应用程序提供了一套完整的自动化解决方案，使您从开发到生产都一路走来。这是完整的Chef解决方案。

trans-unit.source: Chef is maintained on GitHub. To contribute to Chef, such as submitting a pull request, requires using GitHub and git. The sections below describe how to use git to set up the Chef repository, keep it current and synchronized, and how to use branches to submit pull requests.
trans-unit.target: Chef是在GitHub上维护的。要为Chef做出贡献,比如提交一个拉取请求,需要使用GitHub和git。下面的章节将介绍如何使用 git 来设置 Chef 仓库,保持仓库的更新和同步,以及如何使用分支来提交拉取请求。

trans-unit.source: Chef provides Amazon Machine Images (AMIs) for Chef Automate and Chef Infra Server that can be launched from the AWS Marketplace. Hourly metered billing and Bring Your Own License (BYOL) options are available.
trans-unit.target: Chef提供了适用于Chef Automate和Chef Infra Server的Amazon机器映像（AMI），可以从AWS Marketplace启动。提供按小时计费计费和自带许可证（BYOL）选项。

trans-unit.source: Chef provides a fully functional Chef Automate server that can be launched from the Azure Marketplace. A single VM running Chef Automate and Chef Infra Server will be provisioned and configured for you. The only requirement is that you provide your own Chef Automate license at the time of launch; otherwise, Chef Automate will run under a 30-day free trial. If you would like to continue using the image after 30 days, please contact amp@chef.io to obtain a new license.
trans-unit.target: Chef提供了可以从Azure市场启动的功能齐全的Chef Automate服务器。将为您配置和配置一个运行Chef Automate和Chef Infra Server的虚拟机。唯一的要求是您在发布时必须提供自己的Chef Automate许可证；否则，Chef Automate将在30天的免费试用期内运行。如果您想在30天后继续使用该映像，请联系amp@chef.io以获取新的许可证。

trans-unit.source: Chef push jobs can be upgraded as part of a standalone or high availability configuration:
trans-unit.target: Chef推送作业可以作为独立或高可用性配置的一部分进行升级。

trans-unit.source: Chef push jobs is an extension of the Chef server that allows jobs to be run against nodes independently of a chef-client run. A job is an action or a command to be executed against a subset of nodes; the nodes against which a job is run are determined by the results of a search query made to the Chef server.
trans-unit.target: Chef push jobs是Chef服务器的一个扩展,它允许独立于chef-客户端运行的节点运行作业。作业是针对一个节点子集执行的动作或命令;作业所针对的节点由向Chef服务器进行搜索查询的结果决定。

trans-unit.source: Chef push jobs uses the Chef server API and a Ruby client to initiate all connections to the Chef server. Connections use the same authentication and authorization model as any other request made to the Chef server. A knife plugin is used to initiate job creation and job tracking.
trans-unit.target: Chef推送作业使用Chef服务器API和Ruby客户端来启动所有与Chef服务器的连接。连接使用与任何其他向Chef服务器发出的请求相同的认证和授权模型。一个小刀插件用于启动作业创建和作业跟踪。

trans-unit.source: Chef requires that the self-signed Chef Automate SSL certificate (HOSTNAME.crt) is located in the /etc/chef/trusted_certs directory on any node that wants to send data to Chef Automate. This directory is the location into which SSL certificates are placed when a node has been bootstrapped with Chef Infra Client.
trans-unit.target: Chef要求自签名的Chef Automate SSL证书（ HOSTNAME.crt ）位于任何要将数据发送到Chef Automate的节点上的 /etc/chef/trusted_certs 目录中。当已用Chef Infra Client自举节点时，此目录是放置SSL证书的位置。

trans-unit.source: Chef server 12 enables SSL verification by default for all requests made to the server, such as those made by knife and the chef-client. The certificate that is generated during the installation of the Chef server is self-signed, which means the certificate is not signed by a trusted certificate authority (CA) that ships with the chef-client. The certificate generated by the Chef server must be downloaded to any machine from which knife and/or the chef-client will make requests to the Chef server.
trans-unit.target: Chef服务器12默认为所有向服务器发出的请求启用SSL验证,例如刀子和chef-client发出的请求。在安装Chef服务器期间生成的证书是自签名的,这意味着该证书不是由与chef客户端一起运送的受信任的证书机构(CA)签署的。廚師伺服器產生的證書必須下載到任何一台刀和/或廚師客戶端向廚師伺服器提出請求的機器上。

trans-unit.source: Chef server 12 enables SSL verification by default for all requests made to the server, such as those made by knife and the chef-client. The certificate that is generated during the installation of the Chef server is self-signed, which means there isn’t a signing certificate authority (CA) to verify. In addition, this certificate must be downloaded to any machine from which knife and/or the chef-client will make requests to the Chef server.
trans-unit.target: 厨师服务器12默认启用对服务器发出的所有请求（例如，刀和厨师客户端发出的请求）的SSL验证。在Chef服务器安装过程中生成的证书是自签名的，这意味着没有要验证的签名证书颁发机构（CA）。此外，该证书必须下载到刀和/或厨师客户从中向厨师服务器发出请求的任何机器上。

trans-unit.source: Chef server 12 is installed to /opt/opscode. (The existing Open Source Chef remains at /opt/chef-server.) From this point, the chef-server-ctl commands are running against the /opt/opscode location.
trans-unit.target: Chef服务器12安装到 /opt/opscode 。（现有的开放源代码Chef保留在 /opt/chef-server 。）至此， chef-server-ctl 命令在 /opt/opscode 位置运行。

trans-unit.source: Chef strongly recommends using some type of version control tool to manage the source code in the chef-repo. Chef uses git for everything, including for cookbooks. git and/or GitHub is not required to use Chef. If another version source control system is preferred over git (such as Subversion, Mercurial, or Bazaar) that is just fine.
trans-unit.target: Chef强烈建议使用某种类型的版本控制工具来管理chef-repo中的源代码。Chef使用git来处理所有事情,包括烹饪书。使用Chef不需要git和/或GitHub。如果比git更喜欢其他版本源码控制系统(如Subversion、Mercurial或Bazaar),那也可以。

trans-unit.source: Chef/Ohai 14 (April 2018) will remove the IpScopes plugin. The data returned by this plugin is nearly identical to information already returned by individual network plugins, and this plugin required the inclusion of an additional gem into the Chef installation. We believe that few users were installing the gem, and users would be better served by the data returned from network plugins.

trans-unit.source: ChefDK 2.0 or later should only be installed on runners that are associated with Chef Automate 1.5 or later. trans-unit.source: ChefSpec is a framework that tests resources and recipes as part of a simulated Chef Infra Client run. ChefSpec tests execute very quickly. During installation, the high-availability plugin will automatically assign the VIP to the elastic network interface (ENI) for the primary instance.

trans-unit.source: Commit your changes to your fork, making sure to sign-off those changes for the Developer Certificate of Origin with git commit -s
trans-unit.target: 提交对fork的更改，并确保使用 git commit -s 签署开发人员原产地证书的更改

trans-unit.source: Commits to the Chef repositories should never be made against the master branch. Use a topic branch instead. A topic branch solves a single and unique problem and often maps closely to an issue being tracked in the repository. For example, a topic branch to add support for a new init system or a topic branch to resolve a bug that occurs in a specific version of CentOS. Ideally, a topic branch is named in a way that associates it closely with the issue it is attempting to resolve. This helps ensure that others may easily find it.
trans-unit.target: 对 Chef 资源库的提交不应该针对主分支进行。使用主题分支来代替。主题分支解决的是一个单一且独特的问题,并且通常与版本库中正在跟踪的问题密切相关。例如,一个主题分支可以为新的 init 系统添加支持,或者一个主题分支可以解决 CentOS 特定版本中出现的 bug。理想情况下,主题分支的命名方式应该与它试图解决的问题密切相关。这有助于确保其他人很容易找到它。

trans-unit.source: Community member juliandunn created a custom report handler that logs all of the cookbooks and cookbook versions that were used during a Chef Infra Client run, and then reports after the run is complete. This handler requires the chef_handler resource (which is available from the chef_handler cookbook).

trans-unit.source: Community member juliandunn created a custom report handler that logs all of the cookbooks and cookbook versions that were used during the chef-client run, and then reports after the run is complete. This handler requires the chef_handler resource (which is available from the chef_handler cookbook).
trans-unit.target: 社区成员 juliandunn 创建了一个自定义报告处理程序，该处理程序记录了Chef-Client运行期间使用的所有食谱和食谱版本，然后在运行完成后进行报告。该处理程序需要chef_handler资源（可从chef_handler烹调书中获得）。
